gobblin.publisher

Class TimePartitionedDataPublisher

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.publisher.DataPublisher
      • gobblin.publisher.SingleTaskDataPublisher
        • gobblin.publisher.BaseDataPublisher
          • gobblin.publisher.TimePartitionedDataPublisher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class TimePartitionedDataPublisher
extends BaseDataPublisher
    For time partition jobs, writer output directory is $GOBBLIN_WORK_DIR/task-output/{extractId}/{tableName}/{partitionPath}, where partition path is the time bucket, e.g., 2015/04/08/15. Publisher output directory is $GOBBLIN_WORK_DIR/job-output/{tableName}/{partitionPath}

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class gobblin.publisher.BaseDataPublisher

        closer, numBranches, parallelRunners, parallelRunnerThreads, permissions, publisherFileSystemByBranches, publisherFinalDirOwnerGroupsByBranches, writerFileSystemByBranches

      • Fields inherited from class gobblin.publisher.DataPublisher

        state

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void addWriterOutputToExistingDir(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path writerOutput, org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path publisherOutput, gobblin.configuration.WorkUnitState workUnitState, int branchId, gobblin.util.ParallelRunner parallelRunner)
      This method needs to be overridden for TimePartitionedDataPublisher, since the output folder structure contains timestamp, we have to move the files recursively.

    • Method Detail

      • addWriterOutputToExistingDir

        protected void addWriterOutputToExistingDir(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path writerOutput,
                                            org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path publisherOutput,
                                            gobblin.configuration.WorkUnitState workUnitState,
                                            int branchId,
                                            gobblin.util.ParallelRunner parallelRunner)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        This method needs to be overridden for TimePartitionedDataPublisher, since the output folder structure contains timestamp, we have to move the files recursively. For example, move {writerOutput}/2015/04/08/15/output.avro to {publisherOutput}/2015/04/08/15/output.avro
        Overrides:
        addWriterOutputToExistingDir in class BaseDataPublisher
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
